Data

Class PDFWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.DataStorage
      • Data.PDFWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataStorage>

    public class PDFWrapper
extends DataStorage
    Stores binary data for a PDF.
    Author:
    Hirsch Singhal

    • Constructor Detail

      • PDFWrapper

        public PDFWrapper(org.w3c.dom.Node item,
          org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
          Notebook parent,
          java.io.File file,
          javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key,
          int maxSerial)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Used to create a new PDFWrapper.
        Parameters:
        item - Node in the DOM containing this object
        doc - Document used to create new Nodes, Children, and Elements.
        parent - Parent Notebook. Used to force a save once loaded.
        file - Location of the .pdf file.
        key - Used to encrypt the PDF data. Can be null.
        maxSerial - Serial number for this DataStorage object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Occurs if IO access is blocks or an incorrect file is used.

      • PDFWrapper

        public PDFWrapper(org.w3c.dom.Node item,
          javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Used to load a PDFWrapper from a DOM. Decrypts the metadata if needed.
        Parameters:
        item - DOM Node containing the PDF data.
        key - May be null. Key used to decrypt the PDF data and metadata.

      • getPDFStream

        public java.io.InputStream getPDFStream()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a decrypted stream suitable for use with a PDF rendering engine.
        Returns:
        PDF file as a stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Occurs if the data cannot be accessed.
